root.name: Crop 5D
root.description: Select a portion of a sequence in all 5 dimensions (XYZCT)
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2012-09-03 11:46:48
Fixed bug causing the wrong channel to be extracted in some cases
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2012-07-11 12:10:34
New: crop in all 5 dimensions (XYZCT) New: range selection New: Blocks support
- Version 0.1.2.0 Date 2012-03-30 15:01:58
fixed interface behavior on sequence change events
- Version 0.1.1.0 Date 2012-03-30 14:40:04
Minor change to the name of the output sequence
- Version 0.1.0.0 Date 2012-03-30 14:34:54
Bug fixes in T and Z extractions
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-03-30 14:26:21
